text: Nihsandeha ti manisaharu pani kaphira hun jasale bhandachan ki allaha tinamadhyeko eka ho, jaba ki vastavama allaha baheka aru kohi upasana yogya chaina. Yadi yi manisaharu yasta bhana'i athava visvasa parityaga gardainan bhane tiniharumadhye jo avajnakari hune chan tiniharula'i kastadayaka sajaya avasya hunecha
